RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the border patrol agents: Andrew P. Graham and Jay Snodgrass

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Michael Brett Jacquinot: Defendant convicted for possession with intent to distribute marijuana
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Andrew P. Graham: Border Patrol Agent with three years of experience, involved in at least 30 narcotics cases and 15 to 20 alien smuggling cases
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jay Snodgrass: Border Patrol Agent with eleven years of experience, previously served at the Marfa Sector Area Operations Center and the Laredo, Texas, border area
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Andrew P. Graham and Jay Snodgrass: Border Patrol Agents who testified in the evidentiary hearing
